languages.text: An ambull deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to targets on loose ground (with the {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}get off the ground!{/g} effect), even if the attack is {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}.

traits.locale_text: An ambull deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to those targets, even if the attack is {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}.

languages.text: An ambull deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to targets on loose ground (with the {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}get off the ground!{/g} effect), even if the attack is {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}.
languages.original_text: Амбулл наносит дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} любой цели на рыхлой земле (под действием эффекта {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}не стой на земле!{/g}) даже при успешном {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонении{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировании{/g}.

languages.text: Амбулл наносит дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} любой цели на рыхлой земле (под действием эффекта {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}не стой на земле!{/g}) даже при успешном {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонении{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировании{/g}.
languages.original_text: An ambull deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to targets on loose ground (with the {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}get off the ground!{/g} effect), even if the attack is {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Амбулл наносит дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} любой цели на рыхлой земле (под действием эффекта {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}не стой на земле!{/g}) даже при успешном {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонении{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировании{/g}.

Амбулл наносит дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} любой цели на рыхлой земле (под действием эффекта {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}не стой на земле!{/g}) даже при успешном {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонении{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировании{/g}.

languages.text: Ambullen fügen Zielen auf lockerem Boden (mit dem Effekt {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}Weg vom Boden!{/g}) selbst dann zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu, wenn sie {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweichen{/g} oder den Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parieren{/g}.
languages.original_text: An ambull deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to targets on loose ground (with the {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}get off the ground!{/g} effect), even if the attack is {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Ambullen fügen Zielen auf lockerem Boden (mit dem Effekt {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}Weg vom Boden!{/g}) selbst dann zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu, wenn sie {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweichen{/g} oder den Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parieren{/g}.

languages.text: L'ambull inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires aux cibles situées sur un sol meuble (avec l'effet {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}Sol dangereux{/g}), même si l'attaque est {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivée{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parée{/g}.
languages.original_text: An ambull deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to targets on loose ground (with the {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}get off the ground!{/g} effect), even if the attack is {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}.

traits.locale_text: L'ambull inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires aux cibles situées sur un sol meuble (avec l'effet {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}Sol dangereux{/g}), même si l'attaque est {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivée{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parée{/g}.

languages.text: 蚁牛的攻击会对处于松散地面上的目标（也就是受{g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}离开地面！{/g}效果影响的目标）造成额外{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，即便此次攻击被目标{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}，也依然会造成额外伤害。
languages.original_text: An ambull deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to targets on loose ground (with the {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}get off the ground!{/g} effect), even if the attack is {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 蚁牛的攻击会对处于松散地面上的目标（也就是受{g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}离开地面！{/g}效果影响的目标）造成额外{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，即便此次攻击被目标{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}，也依然会造成额外伤害。

languages.text: Un ambull inflige {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional a objetivos sobre suelo blando (con el efecto {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}¡No pises la tierra!{/g}), aunque logren {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivar{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parar{/g} el ataque.
languages.original_text: An ambull deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to targets on loose ground (with the {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}get off the ground!{/g} effect), even if the attack is {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Un ambull inflige {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional a objetivos sobre suelo blando (con el efecto {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}¡No pises la tierra!{/g}), aunque logren {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivar{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parar{/g} el ataque.

languages.text: アンブルは、たとえ攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}された場合でも、（{g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}その地面から離れろ！{/g}の効果によって）緩んだ地面の上にいるターゲットに追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text: An ambull deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to targets on loose ground (with the {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}get off the ground!{/g} effect), even if the attack is {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}.

traits.locale_text: アンブルは、たとえ攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}された場合でも、（{g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}その地面から離れろ！{/g}の効果によって）緩んだ地面の上にいるターゲットに追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。

languages.text: Ambullar, çürük zeminde duran hedeflere, saldırıya karşı {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} yapılmış olsa bile, ({g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}zeminde durma!{/g} etkisiyle) ilave {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir.
languages.original_text: An ambull deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to targets on loose ground (with the {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}get off the ground!{/g} effect), even if the attack is {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Ambullar, çürük zeminde duran hedeflere, saldırıya karşı {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} yapılmış olsa bile, ({g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}zeminde durma!{/g} etkisiyle) ilave {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir.
